skill.name: Archaeology
skill.perk: +{{bonus}}% chance of bonus item from digging
skill.perk_bonus: Chance to get {{rarity}} bonus digging drops
config.AlternativeSkillPageIcon.tooltip: Requires restart, change the page icon from a brush and rock to a shovel.
config.ExperienceFromArtifactSpots.toolt: Archaeology exp gained from digging specifically in an artifact spot.
config.ExperienceFromMinesDigging: Mines and Skull Cavern experince gain
config.ExperienceFromMinesDigging.toolti: Archaeology exp gained from digging while in the mines or skull cavern.
config.ExperienceFromBuriedAndPannedItem: Buired items and panning experince gain
Archaeology exp gained from digging up random items like clay, and from panning.
config.ExperienceFromWaterShifter.toolti: Archaeology exp gained from harvesting from a water shifter.
moonslime.Archaeology.skill_book.levelup: You learned a few things about Archaeology.
moonslime.Archaeology.water_shifter.name: Water Sifter
moonslime.Archaeology.water_shifter.desc:
Place it in the water, string it with fiber, and check the next day to see it has anything. 
Works in streams, lakes, and the ocean.
Archaeology5a.name: Pioneer
Archaeology5a.desc: Extra chances of artifact spots spawning.
Archaeology5b.name: Dowser
Archaeology5b.desc: Extra chances of panning spots spawning.
Archaeology10a1.name: Antiquarian
Archaeology10a1.desc: Be able to find additional Artifacts while digging.
Archaeology10a2.name: Curator
Archaeology10a2.desc: Sell artifacts that are on displays for twice the amount!
Archaeology10b1.name: Dredger
Archaeology10b2.name: Forty-Niner
Archaeology10b2.desc:
On Successful Panning or Digging, Get a speed boost.
 Duration based on level.
